name: A Dash of Magic
description:
- CONTROLS;

Move - WASD
Change Active Hand - Q
Pickup/Place item - Left Click

- How To Play;

Your objective is simple, craft the Enchanted Items asked for by the customers at the Hand In Window, within the time kimit of the level.
Potions may also be crafted - these grant additional time!  (Found in the second tab in the Hand In Window)

Around your workshop can be found a number of stations, each with a different purpose;

Cupboard/Fridge:
These dispense ingredients, used to craft items and potions. Combine them at the Combining Table, or place them on the Holding Table for later.

Item Pile:
A pile of mundane items such as swords, spades and bottles for use in crafting Enchanted Items.

Combining Table:
The place where enchanted items are crafted. Place the correct ingredients into the specific slots (as seen in the recipe book) to create the new item. Click it to redeem it into your active hand.

Cauldron:
Used to cook certain ingredients into new ones

Trash:
Dispose of items into the bin of chewing. Items take 3 seconds to disappear.

Recipe Book:
Consult the book to learn how to make the items requested by the wizards. REMEMBER, the exact positions of items is required [ie, spade at the top

Good to Know;
Items from the fridge will melt into wet sludge if left at room temperature for 20 seconds, you'll have to be careful & plan ahead!

Items left in the Cauldron can burn if overcooked!
